page.title: 11A DAY IN A PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The{bell}goes at 8.55am. We line up until a teacher allows us in. She then calls the dinner and ordinary registers. We do a page of handwriting before service. At service we sing hymns and listen to religious stories.We do comprehension and maths after. { Playtime}is 10.40am to 10.55am, we go outside unless it is raining. The{Juniors}go to dinner at 12pm while the infants play,then we change over. At 1.10pm the Juniors come in for silent reading for 20 mins. We usually do Games, Art, Music workshop or get on with a project. The{play}is from 2.15pm to 2.30pm and at 3pm a teacher tells us to clear up and she reads us a story. At{3.30pm}we say a prayer,and then we go home.
